channel.title: Zikai Wang (王子恺)
channel.description: Recent content on Zikai Wang (王子恺)

item.description: I’m a PhD student in Khoury College of Computer Sciences at Northeastern University, advised by Prof. Cheng Tan. Before Northeastern, I obtained my M.E and B.E in Renmin University of China (RUC) under the supervision of Prof. Yunpeng Chai. My research interest lies in building verifiable intelligent systems. Publications 2021 Rethink the Linearizability Constraints of Raft for Distributed Key-Value Stores Yangyang Wang, Zikai Wang, Yunpeng Chai, Xin Wang 2021 IEEE 37th International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE), Chania, Greece, 2021 Education PhD in Computer Science, Northeastern University
